document.title: Other Files Items
document.paragraph:
This section of the documentation covers the most atomic components of an EiffelEnvision ../../../project.xml Project 's structure. These are file items located under the
../../project_items.xml Project Items Folder , ../index.xml Cluster Folders and ../../../other_project_items/index.xml Other Project Items .
in_this_section
2 In This Section
eiffel_classes.xml Eiffel Classes
The Eiffel source code files that are implicitly added to EiffelEnvision projects when ../../../../configuring/adding_items/adding_clusters.xml Adding New Clusters to projects. These types of file items will only be found under ../index.xml Cluster Folders and the ../../project_items.xml Project Items Folder .
file_items.xml Generic File Items
The basic, generic, file item that represents all non-Eiffel source code files in an ../../../index.xml EiffelEnvision Project .
